subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The SchemaCrawler plugin example demonstrates how to extend SchemaCrawler in two ways - one to add a new command, and the other to create a new custom linter.

ol.li:
The Maven project in this example has a new SchemaCrawler command, and a custom linter.
The new SchemaCrawler command is created by implmenting CommandProvider. The command provider registration is in the META-INF/services/schemacrawler.tools.executable.CommandProvider file.
To create the new lint, we have followed the steps in
SchemaCrawler Lint - Lint Extensions.
Make sure that Maven is on your path.
Run mvn package to build the SchemaCrawler plugin jar.
See the output produced in the target/site directory.
Try defining a new database connection, using your favorite database and driver.
